description: Try our easy to follow Chicken, Black Bean & Cheese Quesadillas recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Quesadilla,High protein,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Chicken,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Chicken, Black Bean & Cheese Quesadillas Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.66 cup canned black beans, drained, rinsed

recipeInstructions.text: Combine chicken, corn, beans, onion and coriander in a bowl.
Place tortillas on a bench and sprinkle cheese evenly over half of each tortilla. Top with 1/3 cup chicken mixture and spread evenly. Fold tortilla over and press to enclose.

Heat 2 large frying pans over medium heat. Spray tortillas with a little oil, place into pan and cook for 2 minutes. Turn over, press edge down to seal and cook a further 23 minutes or until golden. Cut tortillas in half and serve with salsa and sour cream.
